title: Local Temperature Companion App
tooltip: Companion app for the 'Local Temperature' IoT Node.js app.
description: An IoT companion app that visualizes data received wirelessly from the 'Local Temperature' IoT Node.js project (which needs to be  running on a IoT platform with an appropriate temperature sensor attached. The matching IoT Node.js project can be found under the Internet of Things (IoT) with Node.js Projects: Start with a Sample or Template.
